item.title: 1976 Cabernet Sauvignon
item.description: Upon its release in 1980, the inaugural 1976 Jordan Alexander Valley Cabernet Sauvignon was favorably compared with the great grand crus of Bordeaux because of its balance and finesse. Possessing ripe, herbal, black cherry, and currant flavors with an absence of firm tannin, the wine became recognized for its accessibility.
item.summary: Upon its release in 1980, the inaugural 1976 Jordan Alexander Valley Cabernet Sauvignon was favorably compared with the great grand crus of Bordeaux because of its balance and finesse. Possessing ripe, herbal, black cherry, and currant flavors with an absence of firm tannin, the wine became recognized for its accessibility.

item.title: 1977 Cabernet Sauvignon
item.description: Our second vintage produced, 1977 Jordan Alexander Valley Cabernet Sauvignon yielded a concentrated, structured wine due to the historic drought conditions.
item.summary: Our second vintage produced, 1977 Jordan Alexander Valley Cabernet Sauvignon yielded a concentrated, structured wine due to the historic drought conditions.

item.title: 1978 Cabernet Sauvignon
item.description: Our first estate vintage, 1978 Jordan Alexander Valley Cabernet Sauvignon offers a taste of history and the charms of an old, classic Bordeaux style wine.
item.summary: Our first estate vintage, 1978 Jordan Alexander Valley Cabernet Sauvignon offers a taste of history and the charms of an old, classic Bordeaux style wine.

item.title: 1979 Cabernet Sauvignon
item.description: In its youth, 1979 Jordan Alexander Valley Cabernet Sauvignon was considered a great wine in terms of fruit and finesse. It was assertive in fruit expression, yet well-rounded in bouquet.
item.summary: Considered a Jordan classic and one of the most long-lived, 1979 was a vintage defined by fruit and finesse.

item.title: 1979 Chardonnay
item.description: After three years of preparation, the Jordan Winery has finally satisfied its own requirements for an estate grown Chardonnay which, in its own genre, compliments the balance and varietal intensity of its red wine.
item.summary: After three years of preparation, the Jordan Winery has finally satisfied its own requirements for an estate grown Chardonnay which, in its own genre, compliments the balance and varietal intensity of its red wine.

item.title: 1980 Cabernet Sauvignon
item.description: The fine tannins, firm acidity and rich cherry fruit characters found in 1980 Jordan Alexander Valley Cabernet Sauvignon have made this one of our longest-lived vintages.
item.summary: The fine tannins, firm acidity and rich cherry fruit characters found in 1980 Jordan Alexander Valley Cabernet Sauvignon have made this one of our longest-lived vintages.

item.title: 1980 Chardonnay
item.description: The 1980 Chardonnay is the second release of this estate bottled wine.
item.summary: The 1980 Chardonnay is the second release of this estate bottled wine.

item.title: 1981 Cabernet Sauvignon
item.description: Our 1981 Jordan Alexander Valley Cabernet Sauvignon captured the intensity of a short, very warm harvest season in wine country.
item.summary: Our 1981 Jordan Alexander Valley Cabernet Sauvignon captured the intensity of a short, very warm harvest season in wine country.

item.title: 1981 Chardonnay
item.description: Our first Chardonnay, produced entirely from our own grapes, is the first vintage yielding a significant production level. We believe it is also our finest vintage to date.
item.summary: Our first Chardonnay, produced entirely from our own grapes, is the first vintage yielding a significant production level. We believe it is also our finest vintage to date.

item.title: 1982 Cabernet Sauvignon
item.description: The 1982 vintage was one of the longest and coolest growing seasons experienced for Jordan Alexander Valley Cabernet Sauvignon.
item.summary: The 1982 vintage was one of the longest and coolest growing seasons experienced for Jordan Alexander Valley Cabernet Sauvignon.

item.title: 1982 Chardonnay
item.description: The 1982 growing season in Alexander Valley was long and cool, producing Chardonnay of great depth and complexity.
item.summary: The 1982 growing season in Alexander Valley was long and cool, producing Chardonnay of great depth and complexity.

item.title: 1983 Cabernet Sauvignon
item.description: The small berries brought to the crush pad in 1983 yielded an old-world style Jordan Alexander Valley Cabernet Sauvignon with bright cassis fruit and firm tannins.
item.summary: The small berries brought to the crush pad in 1983 yielded an old-world style Jordan Alexander Valley Cabernet Sauvignon with bright cassis fruit and firm tannins.

item.title: 1983 Chardonnay
item.description: Although climatic conditions vary less from year to year in California than Europe, annual differences do occur which effect the characteristics of the finished wine. The 1983 vintage was no exception. Changing weather patterns throughout the harvest produced fruit which varied in its maturity. As a result, the total blend of fruit harvested reflects a composite of wines having an array of individual components, but together producing a beautiful wine of complex character.
item.summary: The total blend of fruit harvested in 1983 reflects a composite of wines having an array of individual components, but together producing a beautiful wine of complex character.

item.title: 1984 Cabernet Sauvignon
item.description: A rare vintage combining a copious crop and high quality, 1984 Jordan Alexander Valley Cabernet Sauvignon was always one of Tom Jordan’s early favorites for its remarkable structure.
item.summary: A rare vintage combining a copious crop and high quality, 1984 Jordan Alexander Valley Cabernet Sauvignon was always one of Tom Jordan’s early favorites for its remarkable structure.

item.title: 1984 Chardonnay
item.description: The 1984 Jordan Chardonnay represents a significant improvement in fruit structure from our estate vineyards. The warm growing season, coupled with the increased maturity of our vineyards, provided additional depth and character for the Chardonnay fruit.
item.summary: The 1984 Jordan Chardonnay represents a significant improvement in fruit structure from our estate vineyards. The warm growing season, coupled with the increased maturity of our vineyards, provided additional depth and character for the Chardonnay fruit.

item.title: 1985 Cabernet Sauvignon
item.description: The gorgeous weather in Alexander Valley in 1985 produced ripe, rich and fleshy Cabernet Sauvignons with superb balance.
item.summary: The gorgeous weather in Alexander Valley in 1985 produced ripe, rich and fleshy Cabernet Sauvignons with superb balance.

item.title: 1985 Chardonnay
item.description: Exceptionally balanced fruit produces wine of tremendous length. Flavors of singular dimension give way to more elaborate but subtle essences. Like the white burgundies of France, the naturally high acidity of our chardonnay has been softened by a malolactic fermentation, providing a better balance to the fruit and aged characters of the wine.
item.summary: Exceptionally balanced fruit produces wine of tremendous length. Flavors of singular dimension give way to more elaborate but subtle essences. Like the white burgundies of France, the naturally high acidity of our chardonnay has been softened by a malolactic fermentation, providing a better balance to the fruit and aged characters of the wine.

item.title: 1986 Cabernet Sauvignon
item.description: Alexander Valley saw a big crop in 1986 that produced intense, richly flavored Cabernet Sauvignons.
item.summary: The big, beautiful crop in 1986 produced intense, richly flavored Alexander Valley cabernet sauvignons.

item.title: 1986 Chardonnay
item.description: With quality fruit harvested from Jordan Winery’s estate vineyards in Alexander Valley, winemaker Rob Davis has produced a classic wine that displays in both aroma and taste the natural elegance of the Chardonnay grape.
item.summary: With quality fruit harvested from Jordan Winery’s estate vineyards in Alexander Valley, winemaker Rob Davis has produced a classic wine that displays in both aroma and taste the natural elegance of the Chardonnay grape.

item.title: 1987 Cabernet Sauvignon
item.description: One of Tom Jordan’s favorite vintages, the 1987 Jordan Alexander Valley Cabernet Sauvignon marked our first use of Cabernet Franc in the master blend.
item.summary: One of Tom Jordan’s favorite vintages, the 1987 Jordan Alexander Valley Cabernet Sauvignon marked our first use of Cabernet Franc in the master blend.

item.title: 1987 Chardonnay
item.description: Jordan’s estate vineyards in the Alexander Valley continue to produce Chardonnay grapes with superb balance and pronounced varietal character. With the exceptional fruit of the 1987 harvest, winemaker Rob Davis has produced an elegant wine that again reflects the continuity of style and quality ensured by our estate vineyards and meticulous winemaking practices.
item.summary: Jordan’s estate vineyards in the Alexander Valley continue to produce Chardonnay grapes with superb balance and pronounced varietal character. With the exceptional fruit of the 1987 harvest, winemaker Rob Davis has produced an elegant wine that again reflects the continuity of style and quality ensured by our estate vineyards and meticulous winemaking practices.

item.title: 1988 Cabernet Sauvignon
item.description: Though there are only a few bottles of 1988 Jordan Alexander Valley Cabernet Sauvignon left in our cellar, it remains an intriguing wine.
item.summary: Though there are only a few bottles of 1988 Jordan Alexander Valley Cabernet Sauvignon left in our cellar, it remains an intriguing wine.

item.title: 1988 Chardonnay
item.description: Each new vintage of Jordan Chardonnay expresses with increasing clarity the maturity of the winery’s estate vineyards in the Alexander Valley of Sonoma County. The 1988 harvest provided grapes of exquisite acid-to-sugar balance and layers of deep, vibrant fruit character.
item.summary: The 1988 harvest yielded grapes of exquisite acid-to-sugar balance and layers of deep, vibrant fruit character.

item.title: 1989 Cabernet Sauvignon
item.description: A challenging vintage, 1989 required creativity to fight bad weather and to craft a quality, long-lived Jordan Alexander Valley Cabernet Sauvignon.
item.summary: A challenging vintage, 1989 required creativity to fight bad weather and craft a quality, long-lived Jordan Alexander Valley Cabernet Sauvignon.

item.title: 1989 Chardonnay
item.description: Mindful of the winery’s traditional Burgundian style and the exceptional attributes of the harvest, Jordan Winemaker Rob Davis creates wines of superb structure robed in harmony of aromas and flavors.
item.summary: Mindful of the winery’s traditional Burgundian style and the exceptional attributes of the harvest, Jordan Winemaker Rob Davis creates wines of superb structure robed in harmony of aromas and flavors.

item.title: 1990 Cabernet Sauvignon
item.description: Thanks to the combination of ideal weather and healthy, maturing grapevines, 1990 provided us a remarkable Jordan Alexander Valley Cabernet Sauvignon that was big and lush, yet balanced and harmonious.
item.summary: Thanks to the combination of ideal weather and healthy, maturing grapevines, 1990 provided us a remarkable Jordan Alexander Valley Cabernet Sauvignon that was big and lush, yet balanced and harmonious.

item.title: 1990 Chardonnay
item.description: Beauty is nothing more or less than the harmony of character and circumstance. The excellent 1990 growing season–crowned by perfect harvest conditions–blessed Jordan’s estate vineyards in Alexander Valley providing exquisite grapes for this beautiful chardonnay.
item.summary: Beauty is nothing more or less than the harmony of character and circumstance. The excellent 1990 growing season–crowned by perfect harvest conditions–blessed Jordan’s estate vineyards in Alexander Valley providing exquisite grapes for this beautiful chardonnay.

item.title: 1991 Cabernet Sauvignon
item.description: Considered a classic vintage due to the growing conditions, 1991 Jordan Alexander Valley Cabernet Sauvignon was crafted exclusively from our original estate vineyards.
item.summary: Considered a classic vintage due to the growing conditions, 1991 Jordan Alexander Valley Cabernet Sauvignon was crafted exclusively from our original estate vineyards.

item.title: 1991 Chardonnay
item.description: With modern technology and traditional artistry, the winemaking team shaped this classic using the exceptional grapes harvested from Jordan’s vineyard in Alexander Valley.
item.summary: With modern technology and traditional artistry, the winemaking team shaped this classic using the exceptional grapes harvested from Jordan’s vineyard in Alexander Valley.

item.title: 1992 Cabernet Sauvignon
item.description: Considered an opulent vintage, the 1992 Jordan Alexander Valley Cabernet Sauvignon benefited from ideal, warm weather during the growing season.
item.summary: Considered an opulent vintage, the 1992 Jordan Alexander Valley Cabernet Sauvignon benefited from ideal, warm weather during the growing season.

item.title: 1992 Chardonnay
item.description: The 1992 Chardonnay makes a departure for Jordan Vineyard & Winery! After twelve years of producing “Estate bottled” Chardonnay, we are now blending 6% of our Russian River vineyard grapes with our traditional Alexander Valley grapes.
item.summary: After twelve years of producing “Estate bottled” Chardonnay, we are now blending 6% of our Russian River vineyard grapes with our traditional Alexander Valley grapes.

item.title: 1993 Cabernet Sauvignon
item.description: With three decades of flavor development, a deep complexity now awaits those who open a bottle of 1993 Jordan Alexander Valley Cabernet Sauvignon. Our last vintage with the Estate Bottled designation.
item.summary: With three decades of flavor development, a deep complexity now awaits those who open a bottle of 1993 Jordan Alexander Valley Cabernet Sauvignon. Our last vintage with the Estate Bottled designation.

item.title: 1993 Chardonnay
item.description: Winemaker Rob Davis has once again demonstrated his artful mastery with the release of this magnificent vintage, a perfect marriage of two of Sonoma County’s premier appellations: Alexander Valley and Russian River Valley.
item.summary: Winemaker Rob Davis has once again demonstrated his artful mastery with the release of this magnificent vintage, a perfect marriage of two of Sonoma County’s premier appellations: Alexander Valley and Russian River Valley.

item.title: 1994 Cabernet Sauvignon
item.description: The long, cool harvest season of 1994 allowed this Jordan Alexander Valley Cabernet Sauvignon to fully develop its varietal character through extended hang time.
item.summary: The long, cool harvest season of 1994 allowed this Jordan Alexander Valley Cabernet Sauvignon to fully develop its varietal character through extended hang time.

item.title: 1994 Chardonnay
item.description: Tradition at Jordan Vineyard & Winery dictates that all our wines possess properties that enable them to complement good food. The 1994 Jordan Chardonnay is no exception.
item.summary: Tradition at Jordan Vineyard & Winery dictates that all our wines possess properties that enable them to complement good food. The 1994 Jordan Chardonnay is no exception.

item.title: 1995 Cabernet Sauvignon
item.description: At the release of the 1995 Jordan Alexander Valley Cabernet Sauvignon, this Bordeaux-like wine reminded Winemaker Rob Davis of the hands of a surgeon—strong and well-coordinated, yet delicate.
item.summary: At the release of the 1995 Jordan Alexander Valley Cabernet Sauvignon, this Bordeaux-like wine reminded Winemaker Rob Davis of the hands of a surgeon—strong and well-coordinated, yet delicate.

item.title: 1995 Chardonnay
item.description: The later than usual crush allowed for optimal aromas of green apples and pears without an abundance of alcohol to override the fruit balance.
item.summary: A later harvest allowed intense flavors of green apples and pears to emerge without excess alcohol to override the fruit balance.

item.title: 1996 Cabernet Sauvignon
item.description: Hailing from a year when both vineyard pests and Mother Nature were working against us, the 1996 Jordan Sonoma County Cabernet Sauvignon is a testament to our perseverance with quality during challenging times.
item.summary: Hailing from a year when both vineyard pests and Mother Nature were working against us, the 1996 Jordan Sonoma County Cabernet Sauvignon is a testament to our perseverance with quality during challenging times.

item.title: 1996 Chardonnay
item.description: A vintage noted for ideal sugar levels, creating an optimal balance of aromas and flavors without an abundance of alcohol to detract from the fruit.
item.summary: A vintage noted for ideal sugar levels, creating an optimal balance of aromas and flavors without an abundance of alcohol to detract from the fruit.

item.title: 1997 Cabernet Sauvignon
item.description: The Sonoma County appellation found on the 1997 Jordan Cabernet Sauvignon indicates the broader sourcing of grapes during Jordan Estate vineyard replanting after phylloxera devastated Northern California vineyards.
item.summary: A stunning vintage demonstrating the complexity of flavor possible when sourcing grapes from growers during our replant.

item.title: 1997 Chardonnay
item.description: The Chardonnay experienced a brief tropical rain midway through the season, requiring careful attention to picking. Optimum flavors of fresh green apple and pear fruit were maintained in the process.
item.summary: The Chardonnay experienced a brief tropical rain midway through the season, requiring careful attention to picking. Optimum flavors of fresh green apple and pear fruit were maintained in the process.

item.title: 1998 Cabernet Sauvignon
item.description: Hailing from a vintage where Mother Nature required us to make sacrifices to preserve quality, 1998 Jordan Sonoma County Cabernet Sauvignon displays elegance, finesse and harmony.
item.summary: Hailing from a vintage where Mother Nature required us to make sacrifices to preserve quality, 1998 Jordan Sonoma County Cabernet Sauvignon displays elegance, finesse and harmony.

item.title: 1998 Chardonnay
item.description: Harvest commenced from our estate vineyard in Alexander Valley and from the vineyards in the Russian River Valley, Dry Creek Valley and Mendocino County, showcasing pressed juice redolent in green apple, kiwi and pear fruit character.
item.summary: Harvest commenced from our estate vineyard in Alexander Valley and from the vineyards in the Russian River Valley, Dry Creek Valley and Mendocino County, showcasing pressed juice redolent in green apple, kiwi and pear fruit character.

item.title: 1999 Cabernet Sauvignon
item.description: The first harvest from our estate hillside vineyards, 1999 Jordan Sonoma County Cabernet Sauvignon is at its peak and truly demonstrates the charms of a beautifully aged Bordeaux style Cabernet Sauvignon.
item.summary: The first harvest from our estate hillside vineyards, 1999 Jordan Sonoma County Cabernet Sauvignon is at its peak and truly demonstrates the charms of a beautifully aged Bordeaux style Cabernet Sauvignon.

item.title: 1999 Chardonnay
item.description: A vintage noted for ideal sugar levels, creating an optimal balance of aromas and flavors without an abundance of alcohol to detract from the fruit.
item.summary: A vintage noted for ideal sugar levels, creating an optimal balance of aromas and flavors without an abundance of alcohol to detract from the fruit.

item.title: 2000 Cabernet Sauvignon
item.description: Hillside fruit from our estate delivered lovely fruit characters with balance and structure found in the 2000 Jordan Sonoma County Cabernet Sauvignon.
item.summary: Hillside fruit from our estate delivered lovely fruit characters with balance and structure found in the 2000 Jordan Sonoma County Cabernet Sauvignon.

item.title: 2000 Chardonnay
item.description: A glimpse into our past, the 2000 Jordan Russian River Valley Chardonnay was crafted in a more traditional California style with more creaminess, butter and toasty oak.
item.summary: A glimpse into our past, the 2000 Jordan Russian River Valley Chardonnay was crafted in a more traditional California style with more creaminess, butter and toasty oak.

item.title: 2001 Cabernet Sauvignon
item.description: Our last vintage produced with only two Bordeaux grapes in the blend, the 2001 Jordan Sonoma County Cabernet Sauvignon also marked our third harvest of the Jordan Estate hillside vineyards.
item.summary: Our last vintage produced with only two Bordeaux grapes in the blend, the 2001 Jordan Sonoma County Cabernet Sauvignon also marked our third harvest of the Jordan Estate hillside vineyards.

item.title: 2001 Cabernet Sauvignon
item.description: Our last vintage produced with only two Bordeaux grapes in the blend, the 2001 Jordan Sonoma County Cabernet Sauvignon also marked our third harvest of the Jordan Estate hillside vineyards.
item.summary: Our last vintage produced with only two Bordeaux grapes in the blend, the 2001 Jordan Sonoma County Cabernet Sauvignon also marked our third harvest of the Jordan Estate hillside vineyards.

item.title: 2001 Chardonnay
item.description: A glimpse into our past, the 2001 Jordan Russian River Valley Chardonnay was crafted in a more traditional California style with more creaminess, butter and toasty oak.
item.summary: A glimpse into our past, the 2001 Jordan Russian River Valley Chardonnay was crafted in a more traditional California style with more creaminess, butter and toasty oak.

item.title: 2002 Cabernet Sauvignon
item.description: Considered a vintage of patience and arguably this decade’s greatest, the 2002 Jordan Cabernet Sauvignon marks our return to the Alexander Valley appellation after vineyard replanting due to the phylloxera devastation.
item.summary: Considered a vintage of patience and arguably this decade’s greatest, the 2002 Jordan Cabernet Sauvignon marks our return to the Alexander Valley appellation after vineyard replanting due to the phylloxera devastation.

item.title: 2002 Chardonnay
item.description: The 2002 growing season yielded Chardonnay grapes with optimal sugar development, bright natural acidity, and vibrant fruit character. Partial malolactic fermentation imparted a creamy texture while retaining the 2002 Jordan’s crisp acidity.
item.summary: The 2002 growing season yielded Chardonnay grapes with optimal sugar development, bright natural acidity, and vibrant fruit character. Partial malolactic fermentation imparted a creamy texture while retaining the 2002 Jordan’s crisp acidity.

item.title: 2003 Cabernet Sauvignon
item.description: With its endless layers and silky texture, 2003 Jordan Alexander Valley Cabernet Sauvignon is a delicious wine showing beautifully after more than a decade of bottle age. This product is only available to Platinum members of Jordan Estate Rewards.
item.summary: With its endless layers and silky texture, 2003 Jordan Alexander Valley Cabernet Sauvignon is a delicious wine showing beautifully after more than a decade of bottle age.

item.title: 2003 Chardonnay
item.description: The moderate growing season and a harvest heatwave resulted in a 2003 Jordan Russian River Chardonnay with great balance and finesse.
item.summary: The moderate growing season and a harvest heatwave resulted in a 2003 Jordan Russian River Chardonnay with great balance and finesse.

item.title: 2004 Cabernet Sauvignon
item.description: There is femininity about the 2004 Jordan Alexander Valley Cabernet Sauvignon that will seduce you with soft, supple tannins and a sweetness of fruit. This product is only available to Platinum members of Jordan Estate Rewards.
item.summary: There is femininity about the 2004 Jordan Alexander Valley Cabernet Sauvignon that will seduce you with soft, supple tannins and a sweetness of fruit.

item.title: 2004 Chardonnay
item.description: A glimpse into our past, the 2004 Jordan Russian River Valley Chardonnay was crafted in a more traditional California style with more creaminess, butter and toasty oak.
item.summary: A glimpse into our past, the 2004 Jordan Russian River Valley Chardonnay was crafted in a more traditional California style with more creaminess, butter and toasty oak.

item.title: 2005 Cabernet Sauvignon
item.description: Though this vintage showed well immediately upon its release in 2009, the 2005 Jordan Alexander Valley Cabernet Sauvignon has blossomed in the cellar and is a vintage wine available for sale at its prime. This product is only available to Platinum members of Jordan Estate Rewards.
item.summary: Though this vintage showed well immediately upon its release in 2009, the 2005 Jordan Alexander Valley Cabernet Sauvignon has blossomed in the cellar and is a vintage wine available for sale at its prime.

item.title: 2005 Chardonnay
item.description: A glimpse into our past, the 2005 Jordan Russian River Valley Chardonnay was crafted in a more traditional California style with more creaminess, butter and toasty oak.
item.summary: A glimpse into our past, the 2005 Jordan Russian River Valley Chardonnay was crafted in a more traditional California style with more creaminess, butter and toasty oak.

item.title: 2006 Cabernet Sauvignon
item.description: This vintage perfectly blends Old World and New World styles. With its polished structure, the 2006 Jordan Alexander Valley Cabernet Sauvignon has always suggested the ultimate longevity. This product is only available to Gold and Platinum members of Jordan Estate Rewards.
item.summary: This vintage perfectly blends Old World and New World styles. With its polished structure, the 2006 Jordan Alexander Valley Cabernet Sauvignon has always suggested the ultimate longevity.

item.title: 2006 Chardonnay
item.description: Our patience through this cool growing season and long harvest was rewarded with a complex and elegant 2006 Jordan Russian River Valley Chardonnay.
item.summary: Our patience through this cool growing season and long harvest was rewarded with a complex and elegant chardonnay.

item.title: 2006 Signed Magnum In Wood Box
item.description: This vintage perfectly blends Old World and New World styles. With its polished structure, the 2006 Jordan Alexander Valley Cabernet Sauvignon has always suggested the ultimate longevity. This product is only available to Silver, Gold and Platinum members of Jordan Estate Rewards.
item.summary: This vintage perfectly blends Old World and New World styles. With its polished structure, the 2006 Jordan Alexander Valley Cabernet Sauvignon has always suggested the ultimate longevity.

item.title: 2007 Cabernet Sauvignon
item.description: The 2007 growing season in Alexander Valley made this vintage a winemaker’s dream. A smaller crop yielded more concentrated flavors in the grapes, and moderate temperatures allowed the fruit to mature slowly and beautifully, resulting in one of our top vintages of the decade.
item.summary: The 2007 growing season in Alexander Valley made this vintage a winemaker’s dream. A smaller crop yielded more concentrated flavors in the grapes, and moderate temperatures allowed the fruit to mature slowly and beautifully, resulting in one of our top vintages of the decade.

item.title: 2007 Cabernet Sauvignon
item.description: The 2007 growing season in Alexander Valley made this vintage a winemaker’s dream. A smaller crop yielded more concentrated flavors in the grapes, and moderate temperatures allowed the fruit to mature slowly and beautifully, resulting in one of our top vintages of the decade. This product is only available to Gold and Platinum members of Jordan Estate Rewards.
item.summary: The 2007 growing season in Alexander Valley made this vintage a winemaker’s dream. A smaller crop yielded more concentrated flavors in the grapes, resulting in one of our top vintages of the decade.

item.title: 2007 Chardonnay
item.description: These near-perfect weather conditions in 2007 resulted in uniform ripening of the grapes, creating rich varietal character and vibrant acidity in our Jordan Russian River Valley Chardonnay.
item.summary: These near-perfect weather conditions in 2007 resulted in uniform ripening of the grapes, creating rich varietal character and vibrant acidity in our Jordan Russian River Valley Chardonnay.

item.title: 2008 Cabernet Sauvignon
item.description: A wine that captures the heart of Jordan’s style—balance, elegance and full expression of fruit—Jordan 2008 Alexander Valley Cabernet Sauvignon has a smooth, silky structure that showcases the delicacy of the vintage. This product is only available to Silver, Gold and Platinum members of Jordan Estate Rewards.
item.summary: A wine that captures the heart of Jordan’s style—balance, elegance and full expression of fruit—Jordan 2008 Alexander Valley Cabernet Sauvignon has a smooth, silky structure that showcases the delicacy of the vintage.

item.title: 2008 Chardonnay
item.description: The 2008 may be remembered as the greatest vintage of the decade for Jordan Russian River Valley Chardonnay. Defined by vibrancy and elegance, the 2008 Jordan continues to wow us with its bright acidity years after release.
item.summary: The 2008 may be remembered as the greatest vintage of the decade for Jordan Russian River Valley Chardonnay. Defined by vibrancy and elegance, the 2008 Jordan continues to wow us with its bright acidity years after release.

item.title: 2009 Cabernet Sauvignon
item.description: This vintage is a dream come true for Winemaker Rob Davis, combining both an excellent Alexander Valley growing season and our new direction with fruit sourcing. This product is only available to Silver, Gold and Platinum members of Jordan Estate Rewards.
item.summary: This vintage is a dream come true for Winemaker Rob Davis, combining both an excellent Alexander Valley growing season and our new direction with fruit sourcing.

item.title: 2009 Chardonnay
item.description: 2009 is a vintage where early-ripening grape varieties excelled, thanks to the long, dry growing season. The 2009 Jordan Russian River Valley Chardonnay is a wine defined by elegance and finesse.
item.summary: 2009 is a vintage where early-ripening grape varieties excelled, thanks to the long, dry growing season. The 2009 Jordan Russian River Valley Chardonnay is a wine defined by elegance and finesse.

item.title: 2010 Cabernet Sauvignon
item.description: The 2010 growing season was the definition of cool climate in an appellation known for its warmth, creating near-perfect conditions for thick-skinned Bordeaux grapes like Cabernet Sauvignon and Merlot. A quintessential Jordan, 2010 Jordan Alexander Valley Cabernet Sauvignon is defined by approachability and elegance. This product is only available to Silver, Gold and Platinum members of Jordan Estate Rewards.
item.summary: The 2010 growing season was the definition of cool climate in an appellation known for its warmth, creating near-perfect conditions for thick-skinned Bordeaux grapes like Cabernet Sauvignon and Merlot. A quintessential Jordan, 2010 Jordan Alexander Valley Cabernet Sauvignon is defined by approachability and elegance.

item.title: 2010 Chardonnay
item.description: The 2010 Jordan Russian River Valley Chardonnay is a delicate wine filled with subtle fruit and oak nuances to seduce the palate. Cool temperatures and foggy mornings lingered throughout the summer of 2010, enhancing the intensity of fruit character in our Chardonnay grapes with lower sugar levels and higher acids.
item.summary: The 2010 Jordan Russian River Valley Chardonnay is a delicate wine filled with subtle fruit and oak nuances to seduce the palate. Cool temperatures and foggy mornings lingered throughout the summer of 2010, enhancing the intensity of fruit character in our Chardonnay grapes with lower sugar levels and higher acids.

item.title: 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon
item.description: The 2011 Jordan Cabernet Sauvignon is a true validation of our gifted growers whose vineyards provided extraordinary fruit, allowing us to make a beautiful Bordeaux-style wine in a challenging year. This product is only available to Silver, Gold and Platinum members of Jordan Estate Rewards.
item.summary: The 2011 Jordan Cabernet Sauvignon is a true validation of our gifted growers whose vineyards provided extraordinary fruit, allowing us to make a beautiful Bordeaux-style wine in a challenging year.

item.title: 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon
item.description: 2012 was truly a phenomenal growing season—every winemaker’s dream—which shines through as one of the most complex Jordan Cabernet Sauvignons to date. A long-lived vintage that tastes incredible in magnum now and will continue to reward wine collectors for decades. This product is only available to Silver, Gold and Platinum members of Jordan Estate Rewards.
item.summary: 2012 was truly a phenomenal growing season—every winemaker’s dream—which shines through as one of the most complex Jordan Cabernet Sauvignons to date.

item.title: 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon
item.description: With its rich and seductive flavors, the 2013 Jordan Alexander Valley Cabernet Sauvignon is a decadent and highly collectible vintage showing beautifully in a big bottle.
item.summary: The 2013 vintage exemplifies our move to a higher percentage of French oak aging to complement the natural grape tannin found in the collection of grower vineyards that have been the soul of Jordan Cabernet since 2006.

item.title: 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon
item.description: The 2013 vintage exemplifies our move to a higher percentage of French oak aging to complement the natural grape tannin found in the collection of grower vineyards that have been the soul of Jordan Cabernet Sauvignon since 2006. Jordan is often considered more Saint-Julien in style, but the 2013 Jordan Cabernet Sauvignon is reminiscent of Bordeaux’s Pauillac. This will be a long-lived vintage, perfectly suited for big bottles.
item.summary: The 2013 vintage exemplifies our move to a higher percentage of French oak aging to complement the natural grape tannin found in the collection of grower vineyards that have been the soul of Jordan Cabernet since 2006.

item.title: 2014 Cabernet Sauvignon
item.description: The third in a string of exceptional vintages, 2014 Jordan Cabernet Sauvignon is an opulent yet elegant red that captures the essence of Alexander Valley. This balanced, Bordeaux-style wine coats the palate with a velvety richness and fine tannin structure—a tribute to our increase in new French oak barrels for wine aging.
item.summary: The third in a string of exceptional vintages, 2014 Jordan Cabernet Sauvignon is an opulent yet elegant red that captures the essence of Alexander Valley. This balanced, Bordeaux-style wine coats the palate with a velvety richness and fine tannin structure—a tribute to our increase in new French oak barrels for wine aging.

item.title: 2014 Chardonnay
item.description: The 2014’s bright, stone-fruit flavors have the kind of elevated intensity that makes for a dream vintage.
item.summary: The 2014’s bright, stone-fruit flavors have the kind of elevated intensity that makes for a dream vintage.

item.title: 2014, 2015 & 2016 Cabernet In Wood Box - 12 Bottles
item.description: This wine vertical collection showcases the exciting evolution of Jordan Cabernet Sauvignon—four bottles each from the 2014, 2015 and 2016 vintages—including our first cabernet aged in all French oak. To dig deeper into the nuances of each of these smooth red wines, explore tasting notes included below. This three-year vertical collection of Jordan Cabernet Sauvignon features wines with immediate drinkability and some of the best aging potential. The set includes one 750mL bottle of each wine, packaged in a wood box. A Jordan notecard will be included on all orders with gift notes entered.

item.summary: 2016 was an incredible year for Cabernet Sauvignon. Right off the vine, the fruit aromas were so bright, beautiful and rich, and the delicious fruit flavors were maintained all the way to the bottle.

item.title: 2016 Cabernet Sauvignon Etched Magnum
item.description: A wine with both power and refinement. 2016, a dream vintage from the start, is a fitting year to unveil this special etched magnum. Limited 40th Anniversary Etched Magnum. Available until sold out.
item.summary: Our 40th anniversary vintage is meant to be enjoyed from a big bottle. It’s an elegant, yet structured red wine that is truly an homage to Bordeaux.

item.title: 2017 Cabernet Sauvignon
item.description: The 2017 vintage has aged elegantly in a larger format. Because of the extended bottle aging in magnum, the tannins are well-integrated and smooth—leaving a lengthy, vanilla-kissed finish. This wine’s structure and silkiness would complement an array of dishes and special occasions.
item.summary: A structured, balanced wine meant to be enjoyed from a big bottle.

item.title: 2017 Cabernet Sauvignon
item.description: Winemakers often describe vintages with unusual weather as “challenging” or “unique,” but in 2017, the word used most often was “crazy.” Though it was grown under stressful conditions, the 2017 Jordan emerged as a beauty with charming weight and mature structure in its youth. A vintage that is truly a testament to the resilience of plants and humans alike.
item.summary: The 2017 Cabernet Sauvignon was a more challenging wine to put together. Five major heat spikes in the summer made us grateful to be working with the most experienced and talented grape growers in Alexander Valley. Timing in the vineyard was absolutely key for leaf pulling, crop thinning and harvest. While this vintage took a little extra effort to make, we are very proud of this wine.

item.title: 2017 Chardonnay
item.description: The smaller harvest in 2017 produced a crisp, delicious Russian River Valley Chardonnay that continues to wow us with its brightness and vitality. This unforgettable vintage of Jordan Chardonnay is one for the record books.
item.summary: The smaller harvest in 2017 produced a crisp, delicious Russian River Valley Chardonnay that continues to wow us with its brightness and vitality. This unforgettable vintage of Jordan Chardonnay is one for the record books.

item.title: 2018 Cabernet Sauvignon In Gift Box
item.description: Cradled in a Jordan gift box, Jordan Cabernet Sauvignon is the ultimate gift for those who love fine red wine. Nature often rewards us with an excellent vintage the year after an extremely challenging one, and this was certainly the case in 2018. One of the best vintages Winemaker Maggie Kruse has seen in more than four decades, 2018 delivered both phenomenal quality and aromatics. Its black cherry, boysenberry and black fig aromas jump out of the glass, and the wine’s smooth, rich tannins go on forever. This vintage is ready to drink now and will continue aging gracefully for years to come. Enjoy now after decanting for 45 minutes or cellar through 2038. The set includes one 750mL bottle, packaged in a gift box made of recycled materials. A Jordan notecard will be included on all orders with gift notes entered.
item.summary: This red wine gift set comes with a bottle of 2018 Jordan Cabernet Sauvignon cradled in an elegant, environmentally friendly gift box. It’s a perfect surprise for that special someone who appreciates fine red wine.

item.title: 2019 Cabernet & 2021 Chardonnay In Wood Box
item.description: Bookended by heavy rains and wildfire, Mother Nature certainly put on a show in 2019 and thankfully, did not negatively impact Jordan’s vineyards or wines. The 2019 Jordan Cabernet is truly a showstopper. The palate is filled with flavors of blackberries and cassis that lead seamlessly to a beautiful, silky backbone of spice notes from extended aging in French oak barrels. Enjoy now after decanting for 30-45 minutes or cellar through 2039. The 2021 vintage was a welcome return to normalcy after back-to-back years of challenging growing seasons. Simply put: It was a stunner of a year. The 2021 Jordan Chardonnay captivates flavors of juicy citrus, refreshing Asian pear and tangy lemon peel—all supported by subtle hints of French oak. One of the most balanced chardonnays to date. The set includes one 750mL bottle of each wine, packaged in a wood box. A Jordan notecard will be included on all orders with gift notes entered.
item.summary: Uncork two historic vintages of Jordan in one memorable collection with this wood gift box, featuring Maggie’s first vintage as head winemaker, the 2019 Cabernet Sauvignon and the Chablis-style 2021 Chardonnay.

item.title: 2019 Chardonnay
item.description: The 2019 Jordan Russian River Chardonnay is incredibly French-inspired; it has the fruit profile of green apple, citrus blossom and lemon curd of many previous vintages, but what sets it apart is the mouthfeel. The natural acidity and beautiful minerality leave you salivating for more. A historic vintage, 2019 marks both the 40th anniversary of Jordan Chardonnay and Maggie Kruse’s first vintage as head winemaker.
item.summary: The 2019 Chardonnay is incredibly French-inspired; it has the fruit profile of green apple, citrus blossom and lemon curd of many previous vintages, but what sets it apart is the mouthfeel. The natural acidity and beautiful minerality leave you salivating for more.

item.title: 2020 Chardonnay
item.description: The 2020 Chardonnay is packed with delicious aromas and flavors. The Fuji apple aromas are always the mark of a good vintage, but the way that it is interlaced with Asian pear, lemon, persimmon and white flower is what sets this vintage apart—along with its mouth-watering acidity and French oak backbone.
item.summary: Harvest began earlier than normal due to the need to preserve the quality of the fruit, which introduced a more natural acidity to this vintage. Yields were down 20-30 percent due to spring rains, but the well-balanced fruit harvested was the ultimate reward—especially in a difficult year like 2020.

item.title: 2020 Chardonnay
item.description: The 2020 Chardonnay is packed with delicious aromas and flavors. The Fuji apple aromas are always the mark of a good vintage, but the way that it is interlaced with Asian pear, lemon, persimmon and white flower is what sets this vintage apart—along with its mouth-watering acidity and French oak backbone.
item.summary: The first large format chardonnay bottling since 2004, the Jordan 2020 Chardonnay offers a delicious balance of fresh, aromatic fruit and a touch of French oak. Uncork now for a celebratory gathering or cellar for years to come.

item.title: 2020 Chardonnay In Gift Box

The palate is French-inspired with vivid Fuji apple, always the mark of a good vintage, interlaced with flavors of Asian pear, lemon, persimmon and white flowers. What sets this vintage apart is its mouth-watering acidity that is perfectly in sync with its French oak backbone. The set includes one 750mL bottle, packaged in a gift box made of recycled materials. All gift orders include an optional gift note sent on a lovely Jordan note card.

item.title: Caviar Sampler Gift Set
item.description:
Experience the decadent flavors of artisan California caviar and gourmet fish roe with our Caviar Sampler Gift Set, featuring our favorite Tsar Nicoulai products for pairing with Jordan Chardonnay, Cabernet Sauvignon and Champagne, of course. This gift set even includes blinis and crème fraîche for a complete culinary experience in one elegant box, delivered to your door with shipping included. It’s the ultimate gift idea for wine lovers. This Caviar Sampler Gift Set includes one caviar and four gourmet roes—all farm-raised and hand-crafted in Northern California:
Jordan Chef’s Reserve Caviar by Tsar Nicoulai: a white sturgeon caviar that combines Tsar Nicoulai’s sustainable practices of small-batch farming and curing with a special salt blend created by Jordan’s culinary team. The only caviar to receive a 2018 Good Food Award and available exclusively through Jordan. Tsar Nicoulai Trout Roe: This small, beautifully orange bead has hints of tropical notes in the palate that complements the vibrancy in Jordan Chardonnay. Its bright and silky flavors make it a favorite garnish of Jordan chefs. Tsar Nicoulai Ginger Infused Whitefish Roe: Made with fresh Hawaiian ginger, this golden-hued roe brings out the apple notes in both Champagne and Chardonnay. Tsar Nicoulai Beet & Saffron Infused Whitefish Roe: Naturally infused with real saffron, this vibrant roe has subtle flavors that highlight the earthy notes and red fruits in a mature Jordan Cabernet Sauvignon. Its luxurious, ruby-red color also pairs brilliantly with the red wine in your glass. Tsar Nicoulai Truffle Infused Whitefish Roe: Savory and rich, this roe combines the lush flavor and aroma of white Italian truffle with a deep golden hue. Its subtle earthiness brings out the classic fried herb notes in young Jordan Cabernet Sauvignon.
The Caviar Sampler Gift Set includes one 1-ounce jar of each product, packaged in a gift box. The gift set includes a Mother of Pearl serving spoon, as well as two accoutrements: an 8-ounce package of Bellwether Farms Crème Fraîche and a pack of 16 French-style cocktail blinis. A Jordan notecard will be included on all orders with gift notes entered. Available exclusively online and by calling (707) 431-5250. All caviar purchases will be shipped; this product is not available for carryout. Please review shipping and storage information before placing an order.
item.summary: Indulge with our Caviar Sampler Set, featuring five Tsar Nicoulai products that pair well with Jordan wines. Perfect for a gourmet food gift or for a delicious indulgence.

item.title: Engraved Durand Wine Opener
item.description:
Created by a frustrated wine collector, the Durand wine opener is a highly effective tool for removing fragile corks, whole and intact, from older wines. The Durand’s sleek design combines the prongs of an ah so cork puller and a traditional waiter’s corkscrew into one device. The Durand wine opener is very easy to use and the best tool for avoiding the perils of extracting an old cork from a wine bottle, as corks can crumble after several years. We recommend using the Durand to open bottles of Jordan 20 years or older (all vintages prior to 2001).
This Durand wine opener is packaged in a protective cork case and is engraved with the Jordan logo.
item.summary: Open old bottles of Jordan Cabernet Sauvignon with the wine opener preferred by sommeliers and winemakers around the world, the Durand Wine Opener.

item.title: Gourmet Cheese Sampler
item.description:
Indulge at home with our curated gourmet cheese sampler, delivered to your door with shipping included*. Featuring four of our winemaker’s favorite cheeses for pairing with Jordan Chardonnay and Jordan Cabernet Sauvignon, this cheese pairing selection includes goat, sheep and cow’s milk cheeses, offering several distinct tastes to tempt your palate. Featured Cheeses:
Central Coast Creamery Ewenique - This sheep’s milk cheese features a smooth, delicate texture. The flavor is earthy and sweet, with a savory, rich finish, allowing it to pair with both older and younger cabernet sauvignon vintages. Cypress Grove Midnight Moon - Aged for at least one year, this goat cheese has buttery flavors upfront with a long, caramel finish. As the cheese ages, protein crystals form, lending a slight crunch to the smooth cheese. Comté Reserve 12 Month - Comté, a cow’s milk cheese, is known for its earthy, herbaceous and nutty flavors. The flavors create a seamless pairing with mature cabernet sauvignons, while the creamy texture complements younger vintages. Cabot Clothbound Cheddar - This Vermont cow’s milk cheese has the characteristic texture of an English-style cheddar with sweet caramel and milky flavors that set it apart from other bandaged cheddars. The flavor profile combines sweet, savory, nutty and tangy notes.
Recommended Wines: Enjoy with our Virtual Tasting Trio, which features the 2020 Jordan Chardonnay, 2018 Jordan Cabernet Sauvignon and 2016 Jordan Cabernet Sauvignon. The Jordan gourmet cheese sampler includes one 4 oz. wedge of each cheese with shipping included. The cheeses are packaged in a gift bag and shipped from our friends at iGourmet; any wines ordered will ship separately from the winery and shipping rates may apply. A Jordan notecard will be included on all wine orders with gift notes entered. *Orders are processed within 1 business day and only ship Monday-Wednesday. Virtual tasting events that include a Jordan Gourmet Cheese Sampler have longer lead times for processing.
item.summary: Indulge in a delicious pairing of Jordan wine and cheeses with this gourmet cheese sampler, delivered to your door with shipping included.

item.title: Jordan Chef’s Reserve Caviar
item.description:
Enjoy the decadent taste of artisan California caviar with the Jordan Chef’s Reserve Caviar by Tsar Nicoulai, available exclusively through Jordan. The only caviar to receive a 2018 Good Food Award.
Hand-crafted and farm-raised in Northern California, this white sturgeon caviar combines Tsar Nicoulai’s sustainable methods of high-quality farming and curing with a special salt blend created and applied by Jordan's culinary team. The result is a rich, elegant caviar that pairs beautifully with Jordan Chardonnay and Cabernet Sauvignon, and of course, Champagne.
To create the Jordan Chef’s Reserve Caviar, we harvest salt water and kombu (a mineral-rich type of kelp) from the Sonoma Coast, dehydrate the kombu and then let it infuse with a chilled bath of the collected salt water for three days before kombu is removed and final evaporation occurs, making the caviar’s essential cure. Tsar Nicoulai then sustainably harvests the roe from 100 percent California white sturgeon raised at the company’s farm in Sacramento County before the infused sea salt is applied.
Jordan Chef’s Reserve Caviar is packaged and sold in 1-ounce jars. It comes with a complimentary Mother of Pearl serving spoon.
Available exclusively online and by calling (707) 431-5250. All caviar purchases will be shipped; this product is not available for carryout.
Please review shipping and storage information before placing an order.
item.summary: A collaboration between old friends, this hand-crafted, small-batch American caviar combines Tsar Nicoulai’s sustainable methods of high-quality farming in Northern California with Jordan's affinity for the Sonoma Coast. A 2018 Good Food Awards Winner.

item.title: Jordan Cuvée By Champagne Ar Lenoble
item.description: A special bottling of non-vintage brut Champagne that celebrates the shared values of Jordan in California and Champagne AR Lenoble in France, jointly committed to wines of balance and quality without compromise.
item.summary: The Jordan Cuvée is a special bottling of non-vintage brut Champagne that celebrates the shared values of Jordan in California and Champagne AR Lenoble in France.

Due to its density, olive wood resists odors and stains better than other types of wood. Board is etched with the Jordan logo.

A Jordan notecard will be included on all orders with gift notes entered.
item.summary: Preserve your favorite Jordan Chardonnay or Cabernet Sauvignon with this cool wine bottle stopper made from Jordan grapevines.

item.title: Jordan Reclaimed Wine Barrel Waiter’s Corkscrew
item.description:
Every wine lover needs a special corkscrew in their collection, and every Jordan Reclaimed Wine Barrel Waiter’s Corkscrew has a story to tell. Made in France from French oak barrel staves that helped age Jordan Cabernet Sauvignon, this professional waiter’s corkscrew includes a double-step system for opening long corks like Jordan, a non-stock coated screw, a five-level screw and knife for foil cutting. When recycled, one wine barrel can make about 300 corkscrews.
This wine barrel corkscrew is packaged in a wooden case, and the corkscrew is engraved with the Jordan logo.
item.summary: Uncork your favorite wine with a beautiful waiter's wood corkscrew made from the reclaimed staves of a Jordan wine barrel.

item.title: Jordan Signature Trio Collection In Gift Box
item.description: Cradled in a Jordan gift box, this Signature Trio Collection was created for devoted friends who love all three of our annually released products. This three-bottle gift box features the 2019 Jordan Alexander Valley Cabernet Sauvignon, 2021 Jordan Russian River Valley Chardonnay and 2022 Jordan Estate Extra Virgin Olive Oil. The three-bottle gift set includes one 750mL bottle of each wine and one 375mL bottle of olive oil, cradled in a Jordan gift box made of recycled materials. A Jordan notecard will be included on all orders with gift notes entered.
item.summary: Surprise the cook in your life with this ideal, three-bottle gourmet gift idea: Jordan Russian River Valley Chardonnay, Alexander Valley Cabernet Sauvignon and Extra Virgin Olive Oil.

item.title: Jordan Virtual Gift Card
item.description: Looking for a unique gift for the wine lover in your life? We’re making it easy on you. For the first time, Jordan is offering virtual gift cards for those that are looking to give the gift of Jordan. Gift cards can be used for wines, accessories and culinary products. Gift cards will be emailed directly to the recipient at the time of purchase. Limit one gift card per order.
item.summary: Give the gift of Jordan. Our virtual gift cards are the perfect, thoughtful present for wine lovers.

item.title: Marble Coaster, Cabernet
item.description:
Made from Botticino marble in Lombardy, Italy, these stunning four-inch tile coasters are hand-printed with the Jordan Cabernet Sauvignon label. Backed with cork, these square marble coasters are perfect for any wine lover seeking wine country decor for the home.
A Jordan notecard will be included on all orders with gift notes entered.
item.summary: Take home these beautiful, square marble coasters from Italy featuring the Jordan Cabernet Sauvignon label.

item.title: Marble Coaster, Chardonnay
item.description:
Made from Botticino marble in Lombardy, Italy, these stunning four-inch tile coasters are hand-printed with the Jordan Chardonnay label. Backed with cork, these square marble coasters are perfect for any wine lover seeking wine country decor for the home.
A Jordan notecard will be included on all orders with gift notes entered.
item.summary: Take home these beautiful, square marble coasters from Italy featuring the Jordan Chardonnay label.

item.title: Riedel Champagne Wine Glass - Engraved
item.description: Some of the world’s most renowned wine experts helped develop the Riedel Veritas Series, a collection of glasses designed to flatter specific types of wines. This Champagne Wine Glass is preferred by Champagne connoisseurs, as it elevates the wine’s aromas and flavors far better than the traditional flute shape. Purchase one glass or replace your cellar’s collection. Glasses are engraved with the Jordan logo. Price includes one glass.
item.summary: Enjoy your Jordan Cuvee by Champagne AR Lenoble in the perfect Riedel crystal Champagne glasses.

item.title: Riedel Vinum Bordeaux Glass - Engraved
item.description: Some of the world’s most renowned wine experts helped develop the Riedel Vinum Series, a collection of glasses designed to flatter specific types of wines. Purchase one glass or replace your cellar’s collection. Glasses are engraved with the Jordan logo. Price includes one glass.
item.summary: Savor your current release or aged Jordan Cabernet Sauvignon from Riedel crystal wine glasses, designed to maximize enjoyment of Bordeaux-based wines.

item.title: Riedel Vinum Chardonnay Glass - Engraved
item.description: Some of the world’s most renowned wine experts helped develop the Riedel Vinum Series, a collection of glasses designed to flatter specific types of wines. Purchase one glass or replace your cellar’s collection. Glasses are engraved with the Jordan logo. Price includes one glass.
item.summary: Luxurious stemware matters. Enjoy your Jordan Chardonnay in the perfect Riedel Crystal wine glass from the Vinum line. Etched with the Jordan Winery logo.

item.title: Terraced Olive Oil Dipping Dish
item.description: This dish design is inspired by the terraced olive groves of Italy where the artist, Mary Judge, spends time to create and produce her designs. When filled, a series of concentric rings of lovely greens in descending tones emerges due to the depth of the oil in the dish. This is a wonderful presentation for enjoying the Jordan Estate Extra Virgin Olive Oil with fresh bread or crackers.
item.summary: Enjoy Jordan Estate Extra Virgin Olive Oil at the table with this beautiful clay, olive oil dish.

item.title: Wine Lover’s Spice Blends
item.description:
Bring a taste of Jordan to your kitchen with our culinary team’s new spice blend set, created to pair perfectly with Jordan wines. We collaborated with one of our favorite purveyors, World Spice Merchants, to blend and bottle three custom spice rub recipes—we’ve also included a special house-made Smoked Sea Salt to complete this seasoning kit. Featured Spice Blends:
Cabernet Lover’s Dukkah - made with hazelnut dukkah, pistachio, rose, pink peppercorn and fennel seed. Sprinkle over grilled vegetables or lamb for a rich, cabernet-friendly accompaniment. Chardonnay Lover’s Rub - made with Calico fish rub, turmeric, fennel seed, dill, basil and lemon zest. Rub it on heritage pork, grilled chicken or halibut fish for optimal brightness and vibrancy. Pairs beautifully with a glass of Jordan Chardonnay. Lazy J Rub - made with Demerara sugar, kosher salt, cocoa powder, black peppercorn, coriander seed, ancho chile flake, New Mexico chile flake, lemon peel, cumin and garlic. Inspired by the flavors of Latin braises and moles, this rub pairs beautifully on top of smoked beef brisket, lamb or heritage pork. Smoked Sea Salt - made with sea salt smoked with Jordan Estate madrone and oak. Handcrafted by the Jordan culinary team.
Four Half-Cup Jars in Gift Set Available exclusively at Jordan
item.summary: Bring a taste of Jordan to your kitchen with our new spice blend set, created to pair perfectly with Jordan wines.
